<template>
  <MyHeader/>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
import bus from "@/util/Bus"
//引入组件
import MyHeader from "@/components/MyHeader"
//导入Bootstrop-icon
import iconPath from 'bootstrap-icons/bootstrap-icons.svg'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components:{MyHeader},
  data(){
    return{
      title:"Home",
      iconPath,
    }
  },
  created() {
    bus.on('getTitle',(val)=>{
      this.title = val
    })

  },
  methods:{

  },
  beforeMount() {

  },
  mounted() {

  }
}
</script>

<style lang="less">
@import "less/main";
*{
  user-drag: none;
  -webkit-user-drag:none;
  font-family: MiSans;
  user-select: none;
  padding: 0px;
  margin: 0px;
  transition: all .2s ease-out;
}
body{
  font-size: @OneEm-fontSize;
}
.type-area{
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  align-content: center;

}
#app:extend(.type-area){

}
</style>
